oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Effects of foliar fertilizers on grain quality by using SPAD chlorophyll meter
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Drexler, Dora
Hegedus, Boglarka
Garret, Ed
Jung , Andras
Gyuricza, Csaba
Sardi, Katalin
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Crop health, quality, protection
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: On-farm field experiments were conducted in 2013 around Hungary to evaluate the effect of natural foliar fertilizer applications on spelt yield and grain quality. Four different foliar applications and a control field were compared to monitor the efficiancy of the treatments.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Drexler, Dora; Hegedus, Boglarka; Garret, Ed; Jung , Andras; Gyuricza, Csaba and Sardi, Katalin (2013) Effects of foliar fertilizers on grain quality by using SPAD chlorophyll meter. Poster at: 4th International Conference on Organic Agriculture Sciences, Eger, Hungary, 2013.10.09-12..
